title: Open Line
content:
The indicator shows the price level at the time of the opening of the trading session.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Settings

NameDescription
Days Refers to the number of previous days taken into account when calculating an indicator.
Custom session start If enabled, specifies the start of the custom session, otherwise the start of the default session.

Drawing

NameDescription
Text Defines the text in the displayed label.
Text Size Sets the font size.
Offset Y Sets the y-axis offset of the label in pixels.
Open line Specifies settings for the color, style, and width of the displayed lines.

Properties
NameDescription
Color
Line style
Options:
  • Solid
  • Dash
  • Dot
  • Dash Dot
  • Dash Dot Dot
Width
Line till touch Determines whether to extend the line until it touches the bar.
Extend last Determines whether to extend the last element.
